author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Hindu Education Plus will conduct a free one-day career counselling session at VIT University here on April 7.

It will orient the students studying in IX to XII standards, about various educational opportunities ahead of them after schooling – higher education, and career options.

The Pre-counselling guidance programme will be addressed by educationist Jayaprakash A. Gandhi. A psychometric test for the students to evaluate their aptitude will be a unique event sponsored by BODHI. Students can participate in the psychometric test offered there, by registering online at www.bodhi.co.in.

A written quiz competition will be conducted and the winner will get a desktop.

VIT University is the presenting sponsor. Master JEE is the associate sponsor.
title: Career counselling for students on April 7 at VIT
